conditions.label: Aimed at weekday business travellers, this package includes First Class Open return rail travel with no travel restrictions, and includes up to 3 days car-parking (subject to availability), 1 outward and 1 return free seat reservation, and London Underground Zones 1 & 2 return tickets.
By London North Eastern Railway for the trunk part of the journey, and connecting services of all other operators
Walk-up ticket: can be purchased either in advance or on day of travel, but must be bought prior to boarding
No Railcard or child discounts apply to Packages

A full refund is available (minus an administrative charge of GBP10.00) if the package is wholly unused and is submitted within 28 days of expiry. No refund if the outward leg is unused or the journey partially completed. If the return leg is unused, or parking used but no travel made, there will be a fixed charge for the parts of the package that have been used, as well as an additional administrative fee.

Flexible ticket, allowing outward and return travel within 1 calendar month of date on ticket. Note that car parking days commence with date on ticket. If the outward date is to be changed, need to cancel and rebook for which a GBP10.00 administration charge applies. Car parking for longer than the package allows will be charged at the daily rate applicable.
Reservations are not essential but are strongly recommended.
Allowed without penalty, within the validity of the ticket.
Selected journeys used by weekday business travellers. Not recommended if travel is on Saturdays, Sundays or Bank Holidays.
You must complete your outward and return journeys within one calendar month (inclusive) of the date shown on the ticket.
XP1
Only valid on booked London North Eastern Railway services and required connecting services.
